mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, USER_ID as user_id, QUESTION as question, CREATED_AT as created_at, UPDATED_AT as updated_at FROM BOT_QUESTIONS ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
